mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_phone, me_name, me_gender, me_birth, me_address, me_detailAddress, me_email) values(#{user.me_id}, #{user.me_pw}, #{user.me_phone}, #{user.me_name}, #{user.me_gender}, #{user.me_birth}, #{user.me_address}, #{user.me_detailAddress}, #{user.me_email})
mapper.select: select * from member where me_authority != '시스템 관리자'
